CustomField.formula: IF(OR(ISBLANK(OrderApi__Year__c), ISBLANK(OrderApi__Month__c)), NULL, IF(MONTH( DATE(VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Year__c)),VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Month__c)),1) ) = 12,DATE( YEAR( DATE(VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Year__c)),VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Month__c)),1) ), 12, 31 ),DATE( YEAR( DATE(VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Year__c)),VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Month__c)),1) ), MONTH ( DATE(VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Year__c)),VALUE(TEXT(OrderApi__Month__c)),1) ) + 1, 1 ) - 1 ))
CustomField.label: Expiration Date
